PrimaryCategoryName: Clothing, Shoes & Accessories:Women's Handbags & Bags:Briefcases & Laptop Bags
Description: TL12 Leather laptop case, 'Cyber Bohemian' Mexico's Ricardo Hinojosa creates the trendy design of this laptop case with a rich combination of light and dark brown hues. Crafted of supple quality leather, the laptop case features two external pockets - one that closes with a zipper and the other with a magnetic button and is bordered with metal studs. The main bag opens with a zipper and reveals a brown and white striped interior with a laptop compartment as well as with a zipper pocket. The laptop case features handles as well as a removable strap of adjustable length designed for your personal convenience. Artist: Ricardo Hinojosa MORE FROM THIS ARTIST Item Details Size Case: 11.0 inches H x 15.3 inches W x 3.0 inches D Handle: 12.8 inches L x 1.0 inches W Handle drop length: 4.7 inches from strap to bag Strap: 26.0 inches min L - x 48.0 inches max L x 0.8 inches W Strap drop length: 12.3 inches min L - x 23.0 inches max L Weight 1.50 pounds Materials Leather with zamac fixtures. Cotton polyester lining Additional Info Features a zipper closure Adjustable strap(s) Features a magnetic snap closure Soft smooth leather with a structured shape Genuine leather may naturally show subtle marks, scratches or wrinkles Photos are representative of the item being offered, but are not necessarily of the exact item you would receive. As is the nature of handcrafted items, there may be very slight variations from one piece to the next.
